forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 5 to 14 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 5 to 14 mph.

weather_report:
In the stillness of tonight, the city lies mostly swathed in a delicate veil of clouds, with temperatures gently hovering around a mild 56 degrees. A western breeze whispers through the streets, carrying a touch of the bay’s chill. It’s that enchanting time when the narrative of the day begins to fade, and a sense of calm envelops the bustling city. Tomorrow promises a break in the overcast, as the sun breaks free from its transient cover, shining brightly upon the ever-busy streets of Downtown. The high will flirt with 65 degrees before dipping slightly in the afternoon. This shift from the cool embrace of night to a warm afternoon invites all to abandon heavy layers in favor of a light sweater or a long-sleeved shirt.

Tomorrow is an opportune moment to explore the quieter corners of the city's parks or to meander through the vibrant streets, perhaps indulging in an afternoon café adventure. The fog will recede, revealing the famous landmarks, but hints of moisture still linger—particularly near the coastline, where the marine layer gracefully retreats. Whether you choose to stroll along the waterfront or dive into the bustling local shops, the day beckons with the promise of pleasant engagements. There’s a comforting blend of warmth and mildness in the air, ideal for those who appreciate the nuances of city life at this time of year.
